sourcesContent:
import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { IRegister, IResume, IUser } from '../interfaces/appUser'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { RegisterService } from './register.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'], }) export class RegisterComponent { @ViewChild('profileForm') profileForm!: NgForm; @ViewChild('resumeForm') resumeForm!: NgForm; constructor( private http: HttpClient, private registerService: RegisterService ) {} onSubmit() { const profData: IUser = this.profileForm.value; const resumeData: IResume = this.resumeForm.value; this.registerService.sendData(profData, resumeData).subscribe({ next: (data) => console.log(data), error: (data) => console.log(data), }); } }

Профиль

Резюме
